body.p: Text that is performed by several speakers at the same time (synchronous speech act) is reproduced in only one <sp> element. The different speakers stand together in one <speaker> element. If the common speech is clarified by bracketing, then depending on the place of the bracketing, the respective element gets an attribute value pair @rendition="#rightBraced" or @rendition="#leftBraced" (for coding bracketings see chap. Bracketings).
body.codeblock:
[speaker 1, speaker n] [stage direction]

[text]

p.i: Source: Gotter, Friedrich Wilhelm: Die Erbschleicher. Leipzig, 1789. [Facsimile 170]

body.note: For the encoding of bracketings cf. chap. Bracketings.
